name: prompt-quiz-sample
description: Extension that works as a customizable learning exercise.

action.description: The action to perform: 'make' to create a new quiz, 'load' to load a saved quiz

prompt-quiz-sample.randomize.description: Randomize the order of quiz questions. When enabled, questions are presented in random order regardless of the 'order' setting.

enumDescriptions: Present questions in their original order (1, 2, 3...)
Present questions in reverse order (last to first)
prompt-quiz-sample.order.description: Controls the order in which questions are presented. Ignored when 'randomize' is enabled.

prompt-quiz-sample.range.description: Specify which questions to include. Examples: '0' for all questions, '5' for first 5 questions, '3-6' for questions 3 through 6. Range is applied after ordering.

prompt-quiz-sample.startPrompt.description: Show a confirmation prompt before starting the quiz. When disabled, the quiz starts immediately when the command is invoked.

enumDescriptions: Questions about contribution points in VS Code extensions
Questions about development tools and setup
Questions about extension structure and entry points
Questions about core extension development concepts
Questions about package.json and extension configuration
Questions about publishing extensions to the marketplace
Questions about the VS Code Extension API
Questions about basic VS Code usage
prompt-quiz-sample.category.description: Filter quiz questions by category. Select a specific category to focus on particular topics, or choose 'All Categories' to include all questions.
